synopsis.text:
Ogura Shio, an ordinary high school student with a penchant for military lore, finds her life taking an extraordinary turn during a school trip to Taiwan. Amidst an unexpected assault by alien creatures, dubbed the 'Evolutionary Invasion Objects', Shio discovers her latent power as an 'E-Gene Holder'. This unique ability awakens the spirit of the legendary samurai, Oda Nobunaga, within her, granting her the strength to fight back against these extraterrestrial threats.

As an E-Gene Holder, Shio joins the ranks of DOGOO, a supranational organization committed to defending Earth from these invasive species. Alongside fellow E-Gene Holders, each wielding weapons imbued with the spirits of historical figures, Shio stands on the frontlines of humanity's battle for survival. Her journey transforms her from a solitary military enthusiast into a valiant defender of her world, forever changing her destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
